1.title: Episode #4.1

On school a mortal virus spreads headily. Volodya knows that at school quarantine, and soldiery surrounded territory. To get to school and abandon the limits of school territory now appears not so simply. Not all her friends are glad the return of Dasha. Guys together with all try to find a vaccine. Andrey experiences heavily, that his family remained under an obstruction. Meantime the new "appear" at school.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: After the winter holidays in the countryside elite boarding school attracts students. Among them are high school students Maxim, Dasha, Vika, Roma and Artem, and also two novices is Andrey and Nadya Avdeev, the parents of that disappeared under enigmatic circumstances. Dasha at once pays attention to Andrey. It irritates Maxim that accepts new in bayonets. Another new inhabitant of school is a cleaner Maria. Nobody knows that she ran from a psychiatric clinic and appeared here not nearly by chance. In the first educational day the elderly teacher of history Ivan ...

2.plot: Guys find the letter of Ivan Savelevich and hear about secret investigation that was many years conducted by a teacher. Mutual liking between Maria and Victor, head master, becomes more obvious. It causes dissatisfaction of fiancee Victor - head of the teaching department of school Elena. Nadya appears secret friend who lives in the woods. The supply manager of school Galina Vasilievna hears that Maria is searched by a militia, and discharges her.

3.plot: The boys go into the woods in search of Ivan Savelyevich and make sure that the teacher is in trouble. The relationship between Maxim and Andrey become even more strained. In the evening in the room Ivan Savelyevich boys find a secret passage to the attic and find out about the unknown past school.

6.title: Episode #1.6

imdb.plot outline: in this TV series there is a school and in that school have been many secrets, students from this school find out that a teacher has gone missing so they start to look for him this then leads into a long journey which gets into a difficult situation where it's hard to escape from (season 4 and I think season 3). At the end many things get revealed and the series comes to an end. This TV series is very emotional and funny at the same time.
